Equipment Actions.Action 1: Bite, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 5 Piercing

Other Actions.Action 1: Antennae, The Rust Monster corrodes nonmagical ferrous metal objects it can see within 5ft of it.  If the targeted metal is being worn or carried by a creature, they can make a Dexterity saving throw to avoid the Rust Monster's touch

Abilities.Ability 1: Iron Scent, The Rust Monster can pinpoint the location of any ferrous metal within 30ft of it by smell
Abilities.Ability 2: Rust Metal, Any nonmagical weapon made of metal that hits the Rust Monster starts to corrode after dealing damage
